name: web-mentions
description: Web mention receiver deployed to AWS with serverless
author: Pfych (https://pfy.ch)

scripts.deploy:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=$PROFILE && pnpm run build && sam deploy --template template.yaml --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region $REGION --stack-name="$PROFILE-$npm_package_name-dev" --resolve-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ParameterKey=Stage,ParameterValue=dev
scripts.deploy:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=$PROFILE && pnpm run build && sam deploy --template template.yaml --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region $REGION --stack-name="$PROFILE-$npm_package_name-prod" --resolve-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ParameterKey=Stage,ParameterValue=prod
